ComicInfo.Summary: Part 5: Anime Conquers the World!: The computer animation studio Pixar slowly gains traction, then ultimately absorbs Disney's entire animation department. Bruce Timm's Batman and Matt Groening's Simpsons change television animation and Hayao Miyazaki's celebrated anime films eventually find favor in the United States.
